attributes.action: pull our troops out of Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
AFTER WATCHING THE NEWS ABOUT THE DEATHS OF FOUR OF OUR SOLDIERS IN IRAQ ,I ASKED MY DAD WHAT ARE OUR YOUNGSTERS DOING THERE AND HIS REPLY WAS QUOTE ''TO BE HONEST I DON'T KNOW AS IT WAS BASED ON ACTIVE TERRORISM IN THE WORLD AND WEAPONS OF MASS DESTRUCTION THOUGHT TO BE HELD BY SADDAM''.
HE TOLD ME THAT THERE WAS NEVER ANY FOUND.
SO I WANT OUR TROOPS BACK HOME WITH THEIR FAMILIES AND IF THEY DO NEED TO GO TO WAR THEN IT MUST BE A JUST ONE.

rejection.details: You need to re-draft without all the CAPITALS, as it makes it difficult for prople to read
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
